endpoints.description: Retrieve the predicted gas consumption patterns for specified time intervals.
Submit parameters for generating a custom consumption pattern forecast.
Fetch the current supply-demand balance metrics for a specified region.
Update the supply allocation plan based on forecast adjustments.
Retrieve the live gas distribution status across the network.
Trigger adjustments in the gas distribution network settings.
Retrieve efficiency analysis metrics based on current operations.
Submit parameters for a detailed efficiency analysis request.
Retrieve configuration details for monitored regions.
Update configuration settings for a specific monitored region.
